name: Type 'n Jump
description:
Type 'n Jump is an text-based platformer, made for Ludum Dare 41 (the theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres").

Vote for the game :)

HOW TO PLAY:

Just type the commands to move the robot.

  • RIGHT
  • LEFT
  • JUMP
  • STOP
  • FIRE
  • TURN
  • JUMP RIGHT
  • JUMP LEFT
  • HELP

Design by Richard Nunes da Silva

Code by Eduardo Scheffler

Tools:

  • Engine: Unity
  • Graphics: Adobe Suite
  • Sounds: Bfxr
  • Music: Figure
